sentences.en: After refining the oil is free from fatty acids, light yellow, transparent and odourless.
sentences.cn: 加工之后,油不再有脂肪酸, 颜色淡黄 、 透明并且无味.

sentences.en: At room temperature, water is a colourless , odourless, tasteless liquid.
sentences.cn: 室温下, 水是无色、无嗅 、 无味的液体.

sentences.en: Hydrogen is a corlourless, odourless gas.
sentences.cn: 氢气是一种无色 、 无味的气体.

sentences.en: Hydrogen is referred to as H 2. It is a colourless, odourless and tasteless gas.
sentences.cn: 氢气的分子式为H2, 它是一种无色 、 无溴和无味的气体.

sentences.en: It is a colourless , odourless and tasteless gas, slightly heavier than air.
sentences.cn: 它是一种无色、无溴、无味的气体, 比空气稍重.

sentences.en: Made from aqueous formula, this product is colourless , odourless, non - toxic , non - corrosive, non - irritating and environment friendly.
sentences.cn: 本品使用水性免洗配方, 温和无刺激,具有无色 、 无毒 、 无腐蚀 、 绿色环保的优点.

sentences.en: Our new product will keep your bathroom clean and odourless.
sentences.cn: 我厂新产品能保持您的浴室洁净无味.

sentences.en: Pure air is colourless and odourless.
Strongly adhesive, odourless, ready to use, safe and sanitary, it is an ideal fly terminator.
sentences.cn: 强力粘胶, 超强引诱, 简便易行, 安全卫生, 为理想的捕蝇用具.

sentences.en: White or slightly coloured crystalline powder, odourless.
sentences.cn: 白色或微色晶体粉末, 无臭.
